name: Walking In The Sky
description:
Good day to you all! 

We are a game-making duo. Our mission is to create beautiful and kind games exclusively without violence. However, we do not get exactly games, but something like an interactive gallery of art and music. My name is Artem, I most often act as a programmer and composer of our projects, and then there is Elena, she is an artist and illustrator. And this game is our debut.

We hope we are doing something useful for you. Thanks! =)
